pageContext.claim: “Mexico makes more than a hundred billion dollars a year on the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear where Trump got the $100 billion figure. Typically, when he says $71 billion, is citing figures for trades in goods, but not including services. Regardless, the United States had a trade deficit of $56 billion in 2016 with Mexico when services are included. And then he doubled the number for some reason.
